      static void forceUnbind()
      强制解绑;如果App与设备是出于连接状态，应该使用unbind()方法去解绑,如果尝试2次仍未成功，则可使用该方法去解绑; 如果是出于断开状态，则应使用该方法去解绑设备; 你应先通过registerUnbindCallBack(UnbindCallBack.ICallBack)去设置 监听，这样你才能知道是否解绑成功
      Force unbind;If the App is out of disconnection, the method should be used to unbind.

      static void unbind()
      解绑设备;如果App与设备是出于连接状态，应该使用该方法去解绑，如果是出于断开状态， 则应使用forceUnbind()去解绑设备; 你应先通过registerUnbindCallBack(UnbindCallBack.ICallBack)去设置 监听，这样你才能知道是否解绑成功

      • unbind

        public static void unbind()
        解绑设备;如果App与设备是出于连接状态，应该使用该方法去解绑，如果是出于断开状态， 则应使用forceUnbind()去解绑设备; 你应先通过registerUnbindCallBack(UnbindCallBack.ICallBack)去设置 监听，这样你才能知道是否解绑成功
        Unbind device;If the App is connected to the device, the method should be used to unbind. If it is out of disconnection, use forceUnbind() to unbind the device. You should first pass registerUnbindCallBack(UnbindCallBack.ICallBack) to set listen, so that you can know whether successful or not

      • forceUnbind

        public static void forceUnbind()
        强制解绑;如果App与设备是出于连接状态，应该使用unbind()方法去解绑,如果尝试2次仍未成功，则可使用该方法去解绑; 如果是出于断开状态，则应使用该方法去解绑设备; 你应先通过registerUnbindCallBack(UnbindCallBack.ICallBack)去设置 监听，这样你才能知道是否解绑成功
        Force unbind;If the App is out of disconnection, the method should be used to unbind. If it is connected to the device, use unbind() to unbind the device. This method can be used to use unbind() to unbind if you have tried two unsuccessful attempts. You should first pass registerUnbindCallBack(UnbindCallBack.ICallBack) to set listen, so that you can know whether successful or not

                                                    java.lang.String fileName,
                                                    com.ido.ble.dfu.firmware.FirmwareListener.IDownloadListener iDownloadListener)

        参数:
        downloadUrl - 下载地址
